name: Version 1.1 [README]
info:
NOTE: This flow requires the "Common Flows".
Import the following flow into your Node-RED and set the cameras and MQTT Settings.

[
    {
        "id": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "type": "tab",
        "label": "Common flows",
        "disabled": false,
        "info": "",
        "env": []
    },
    {
        "id": "02db7f93b04a492f",
        "type": "change",
        "z": "5c11fed7a3291d98",
        "name": "",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "set",
                "p": "device",
                "pt": "global",
                "to": "payload",
                "tot": "msg"

        ],
        "action": "",
